message:
Katherine Klyce said the way her late husband John Wheeler's body was dumped at a landfill site in Delaware could only have been carried out by a professional.

‎""While working at the Pentagon Mr Wheeler wrote a manual on the effectiveness of biological & chemical weapons and recommended that the US should not use biological warfare."

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1358447/Pentagon-aide-killed-hitman-claims-distraught-widow.html
